sentences.english: Sleep enuresis is a fancy term for bed-wetting.
sentences.chinese: 遗尿症是尿床的术语解释。

sentences.english: A couple of weeks ago, I saw a 5-year-old girl who was still wetting the bed every night.
sentences.chinese: 数周前，我诊治了一个五岁了还每晚尿床的小女孩。

sentences.english: My son wets his bed every night.
The fact that the beating had not hurt was a sort of victory and partially wiped out the shame of the bed-wetting.
sentences.chinese: 打的不疼是因为尿床的羞耻感太强而使我麻痹了。

sentences.english: Urinary bed alarms are generally regarded as the most effective bedwetting treatment for the long term.
sentences.chinese: 尿床警报器通过被视为最有效的治疗长期尿床的手段。

sentences.english: Urinary bed alarms are generally regarded as the most effective bedwetting treatment for the long term.
sentences.chinese: 尿床警报器通过被视为最有效的治疗长期尿床的手段。

sentences.english: First of all, health experts say bed-wetting should be treated with understanding.
sentences.chinese: 首先，健康专家说尿床应该是以理解治疗。

sentences.english: Enuresis can have a number of physiological causes.
sentences.chinese: 尿床可能有多种生理原因。

sentences.english: Your 7-year-old daughter still wets her bed.
sentences.chinese: 你7岁大的女儿还在尿床。

sentences.english: Chronic constipation can contribute to bed-wetting by reducing bladder capacity.
sentences.chinese: 慢性便秘会引起尿床，因为减少了膀胱的容量。

sentences.english: Bed-wetting is more common in boys than girls.
sentences.chinese: 尿床男孩比女孩更普遍。

sentences.english: Some children who wet their beds do not produce enough ADH at night.
sentences.chinese: 一些儿童尿床是因为夜晚没有分泌足够的抗利尿激素。

sentences.english: Indeed, one of the worst things about bed-wetting is the stigma.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，对尿床的人来说最糟糕的就是感觉耻辱。

sentences.english: The breast-fed infant will not easily wet the bed.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿期喝母乳的儿童以后不容易尿床。

sentences.english: Bedwetting can also affect children older than six or seven.
sentences.chinese: 尿床也可以影响儿童的年纪比六或七。

sentences.english: All children with wetting problems should be checked for urinary tract infections.
sentences.chinese: 所有尿床的患儿需要接受尿道感染检查。

definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
to pee pee (kiddie or feminine slang)
